translated: Birth-Stories 🔽The Group of Discourses 🔽The Chapter on the Virtuous
The Birth Story of the Monkey Dubbhiya
to the one who was exhausted and thirsty;
But now you are making a fuss,
it is better to be unassociated with bad people.”
